casebody.data:
GARFIELD INVESTMENT CORPORATION, a Delaware Corporation, v. CITY OF ENID, a Municipal Corporation, et al. No. 5000. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Jan. 6, 1955. Frank Carter and W. W. Musser, Jr., Enid, Okl., for appellant. H. L. Gasaway, Enid, Okl., for appel-lees.

Before BRATTON and PICKETT, Circuit Judges, and VAUGHT, District Judge.
